ygData.subject: Re: Is Power Leveling bad?
ygData.msgSnippet: At second level a man gave my character 106 plats, I never saw him again.  I spent it on full leather armor from Kelethin and proceeded to armor my entire
ygData.messageBody:
At second level a man gave my character 106 plats, I never saw him again. I
spent it on full leather armor from Kelethin and proceeded to armor my entire
party of second level friends.

At tenth one of my guild members took me gnoll hunting, upped most of my
armor to magical items and healed me while I gained the exp.

At 15th I was hunting alone in gnolls and then and only then got accuse of
power hunting, go figure.

I never saw any of this as wrong, it's a gmae and if you're not having fun
what's the point of playing?
